sentence.Network_en: Soccer referees have a thankless task.
sentence.Network_cn: 足球裁判的工作吃力不讨好。

sentence.Network_en: Sometimes being a mother and a housewife felt like a thankless task .
sentence.Network_cn: 做母亲和家庭主妇有时使人觉得好像是个受累不讨好的差使。

sentence.Network_en: Nobody was keen to take on such a thankless task.
sentence.Network_cn: 没有人愿意承担这种费力不讨好的任务.

PerfectNetExp.abs: thankfulness 感谢thankless 忘恩的thanks to 由于
新概念英语第... ... a. annoyed( 感到烦恼的，不愉快的)； b. thankless( 不感激的，负义的)； d. thankful( 感谢的，感激的)中，只有.
现在，我举个吃力不讨好 (thankless) 的反例：去年一位年轻有为的台湾女生沈芯绫，上传了许多她所拍摄的影像到自己的部落格上， …
常见词语搭配(一)_十八铜钱_新浪博客 ... only（ 独生子） thankless（ 忘恩负义的） chubby（ 胖嘟嘟的）.

list.abs: 她在剧中扮演了一个次要的角色。 She acted as a minor role in the play. 她扮演了一个受累不讨好的角色。 She played a thankless role. 他在剧中扮演.
He is a thankless child ., 他是个不知感恩的孩子.
BEING a Middle East peace envoy is a thankless task ., 做一个中东和平使者是一项不讨好的任务.
take into account 重视,考虑thankless task 吃力不讨好的事情thorny problem 棘手的问题
Roosevelt was reluctant to undertake the thankless task ., 罗斯福不大愿意承担这种徒劳无益的任务.

entry.tran: (工作、任务)吃力不讨好的，劳而无功的
entry.def: If you describe a job or task as thankless, you mean that it is hard work and brings very few rewards.

example.ex: Soccer referees have a thankless task.
example.tran: 足球裁判的工作吃力不讨好。

sentences.sentence: "How sharper than a serpent's tooth it is / To have a thankless child!"- Shakespeare
